bibl.title: Freedom and its Limits in the Ancient World. Proceedings of a Colloquium Held at the Jagellonian University Kraków, September 2003
bibl.note: Non vidimus. Cf. Gnomon 76 (2004), Bibl. Beilage 4, p. 162.
POLANSKI T., Oriens militans: Liberation Movements in Ptolemaic Egypt.

Dariusz BRODKA, Joanna JANIK and Slawomir SPRAWSKI (Edd.), Freedom and its Limits in the Ancient World. Proceedings of a Colloquium Held at the Jagellonian University Kraków, September 2003 = Electrum. Studies in Ancient History. 9 (Kraków, 2003) pp. 75-85.
